page.title: 20LOLLIPOP LADY
page.content: My day starts at 7.30am. when the alarm goes off. I wash and get dressed call my son make the beds then go downstairs make breakfast and washup. At 8.30am I go to work as a Lollipop Lady (School Crossing Patrol Officer). It is my job to see the children safely across the road. At 9.00am I collect the daily papers then do my housework prepare dinner and visit an elderly neighbour. At 11.55 I go to work this time in the capacity of Dinner Supervisor at the local primary school. At 1.05 I go home and have a light lunch,read the papers and then go shopping. At 3.15 I am back on duty as a Lollipop Lady then I go home to cook and eat the evening meal, washup and watch t.v. At 7.30 I visit my mother and take a walk with my husband and son,have bath, then bed at 10.30.
